Serialized Form

  • Package boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib

    • Class boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigChessboard extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • numRows

          int numRows
          Number of squares tall the grid is. Target dependent.

        • numCols

          int numCols
          Number of squares wide the grid is. Target dependent.

        • maximumCornerDistance

          double maximumCornerDistance
          The maximum distance in pixels that two corners can be from each other. In well focused image this number can be only a few pixels. The default value has been selected to handle blurred images

        • thresholding

          boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
          Configuration for thresholding the image

        • square

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector square
          Configuration for square detector

        • refineWithCorners

          boolean refineWithCorners
          If true then it only refines the corner region. Otherwise it will refine the entire line.

        • configRefineLines

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonLineToImage configRefineLines
          Configuration for refining with lines. Ignored if not used.

        • configRefineCorners

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonCornersToImage configRefineCorners
          Configuration for refining with corners. Ignored if not used.

        • squareWidth

          double squareWidth
          Physical width of each square on the calibration target

    • Class boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigCircleAsymmetricGrid extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • numRows

          int numRows
          Number of black circles tall the grid is. Target dependent.

        • numCols

          int numCols
          Number of black circles wide the grid is. Target dependent.

        • thresholding

          boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
          Configuration for thresholding the image

        • ellipse

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigEllipseDetector ellipse
          Configuration for the ellipse detector

        • centerDistance

          double centerDistance
          Distance between each center's center along the x and y axis. Another way to look at this is that it is twice the distance of the center of each grid cell.

        • circleDiameter

          double circleDiameter
          Diameter of each circle.

        • ellipseSizeSimilarity

          double ellipseSizeSimilarity
          How similar two ellipses must be to be connected. 0 to 1.0. 1.0 = perfect match and 0.0 = infinite difference in size

    • Class boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigCircleRegularGrid extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          Number of black circles tall the grid is. Target dependent.

        • numCols

          Number of black circles wide the grid is. Target dependent.

          boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
          Configuration for thresholding the image

        • ellipse

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigEllipseDetector ellipse
          Configuration for the ellipse detector

        • centerDistance

          double centerDistance
          Distance between each center's center along the x and y axis. Another way to look at this is that it is twice the distance of the center of each grid cell.

        • circleDiameter

          double circleDiameter
          Diameter of each circle.

        • ellipseSizeSimilarity

          double ellipseSizeSimilarity
          How similar two ellipses must be to be connected. 0 to 1.0. 1.0 = perfect match and 0.0 = infinite difference in size

    • Class boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigSquareGrid extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • numRows

          int numRows
          Number of black squares tall the grid is. Target dependent.

        • numCols

          int numCols
          Number of black squares wide the grid is. Target dependent.

        • thresholding

          boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
          Configuration for thresholding the image

        • square

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector square
          Configuration for square detector

        • squareWidth

          double squareWidth
          Physical width of the square.

        • spaceWidth

          double spaceWidth
          Physical width of the space between each square

        • refineWithCorners

          boolean refineWithCorners
          Should it refine the corners only? Useful if the input image is distorted

        • configRefineLines

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonLineToImage configRefineLines
          Configuration for refining with lines. Ignored if not used.

        • configRefineCorners

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonCornersToImage configRefineCorners
          Configuration for refining with corners. Ignored if not used.

    • Class boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigSquareGridBinary extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • configDetector

          ConfigFiducialBinary configDetector
          Description of the binary fiducial detector

        • configThreshold

          boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold configThreshold
          Description of image thresholding algorithm

        • ids

          long[] ids
          Ordered list of expected square fiducial ID numbers. Starts from top left and follows a row major ordering.

        • numRows

          int numRows
          Number of squares tall the grid is. Target dependent.

        • numCols

          int numCols
          Number of squares wide the grid is. Target dependent.

        • squareWidth

          double squareWidth
          Physical width of the square.

        • spaceWidth

          double spaceWidth
          Physical width space between each square

  • Package boofcv.abst.tracker

    • Class boofcv.abst.tracker.ConfigTld extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • parameters

          TldParameters parameters
          Configuration parameters

        • interpolate

          boofcv.alg.interpolate.InterpolationType interpolate
          Specifies the type of interpolation. More stable with bilinear, but nearest-neighbor can be used to maximize speed.

  • Package boofcv.alg.fiducial.calib

    • Class boofcv.alg.fiducial.calib.InvalidCalibrationTarget extends java.lang.RuntimeException implements Serializable

  • Package boofcv.alg.fiducial.calib.circle

  • Package boofcv.alg.scene

    • Class boofcv.alg.scene.HistogramScene extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • histogram

          double[] histogram
          Normalized word frequency histogram. Normalized so that it sums up to 1.

        • type

          int type
          The type of scene the image was representative of

  • Package boofcv.factory.fiducial

    • Class boofcv.factory.fiducial.ConfigFiducialBinary extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • targetWidth

          double targetWidth
          Length of a targets size in world units.

        • ambiguousThreshold

          double ambiguousThreshold
          Value from 0 to 1. 0 is very strict and 1 is very relaxed. Used when classifying a require block as black or white. If it can't be classified then the shape is discarded

        • gridWidth

          int gridWidth
          Number of elements wide the encoded grid is. Grids widths of 3, 4, or 5 are common. 4 is the standard.

        • borderWidthFraction

          double borderWidthFraction
          How wide the border is relative to the total fiducial width. 0.25 is standard and is a good compromise between ability to view at extreme angles and area to encode information.

        • minimumBlackBorderFraction

          double minimumBlackBorderFraction
          Fraction of border pixels which must be black.

        • squareDetector

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector squareDetector
          Configuration for square detector

    • Class boofcv.factory.fiducial.ConfigFiducialImage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • maxErrorFraction

          double maxErrorFraction
          If the difference between an candidate and a target is less than this amount it is considered a match.

        • borderWidthFraction

          double borderWidthFraction
          How wide the border is relative to the total fiducial width. 0.25 is standard and is a good compromise between ability to view at extreme angles and area to encode information.

        • minimumBlackBorderFraction

          double minimumBlackBorderFraction
          Fraction of border pixels which must be black.

        • squareDetector

          boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector squareDetector
          Configuration for square detector
